name: Christmas Infestation
description:
Oh no, there's a rat problem on Christmas day. Wack all the rats but make sure not to damage the presents! As time passes, the game gets faster. Try and beat the challenge score: 133!

Made by Mia and Max in a 24 hour game jam.

Music Credits:
